_comment: OneDrive deployment configuration - uses relative paths
_instructions: This configuration uses relative paths that work from any user's OneDrive
1. Copy this file and rename to settings_v2_3.json
2. Create the DATA folder structure in the same directory as the application
3. All paths are relative to the application folder
4. Works automatically regardless of OneDrive username or sync location
_folder_structure: Create this structure in your OneDrive DocumentManager folder:
_notes: Database supports 2-3 concurrent users on OneDrive
SQLite with WAL mode enabled for better concurrent access
Close application when not in use to reduce sync conflicts
All users must point to the same OneDrive folder
